title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Key Targets Hit in Lebanon Following Cross-Border Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: The IDF attacked significant assets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in Lebanon

In response to launches that were carried out towards northern Israel yesterday, Air Force fighter jets attacked significant assets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Ein Qana area, and in the villages of Hamila and Adlun. Simultaneously, fighter jets attacked a observation post in the Tir Harfa area alongside military structures in the Al-Jibin and Al-Hiyam areas.

Additionally, during the night, Air Force fighter jets attacked a launcher in the Majdal Zon area that had been used to fire into Israel yesterday, as well as terrorist infrastructure in the Rasheh Al-Fuqhar area.

Following an alert that was issued shortly before in the Misgav Am area, it was determined to be a false identification. A short while earlier, two launches were detected crossing from Lebanese territory into the Yiftah area and fell in open territory.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/4e19RzV
